overview: Rachel and Shane have the perfect marriageâ€¦or so you'd think! The truth is - their relationship is nothing more than an illusion, as Rachel is still pining for her long-lost first love, Jim. In a matter of moments - life goes from simple to complicated, as Jim returns to claim Rachel. Harvest Moon casts an intense and erotic light upon the ultimate love triangle.
tagline: Remy LaCroix can't fight the moonlight
title: Harvest Moon
